capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old, and I think that's a great age for kids - they're still young enough to be curious and playful, but also starting to develop their own interests and personalities.
Ron is 11 years old, and I think that's a great age for kids to start learning new things. It's not too young, but not too old either. I'm sure he'll make the most of it!

Ron is 11 years old, and I think that's a great age for kids to be learning new things and exploring their interests. It's like, at that stage, they're still young enough to be curious about everything, but also starting to develop their own personalities and tastes.
